tokens.text: validates pack references in world templates

title: World Pack Refs
description: Validates pack references in world templates. Ensures that behavior_packs.json and resource_packs.json correctly reference the packs bundled with the world.

fields.title: Invalid JSON
fields.description: Error when behavior_packs.json or resource_packs.json contains invalid JSON syntax. Check for missing commas, brackets, or malformed entries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the JSON parse error message

fields.title: Missing References
fields.description: Warning when expected pack reference files are missing from the world folder. Packs may not load correctly without proper references.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the expected file name (behavior_packs.json or resource_packs.json)

fields.title: Invalid Pack ID
fields.description: Error when a pack reference contains an invalid or malformed UUID. Ensure pack_id matches the UUID in the referenced pack's manifest.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid pack_id value

fields.title: Missing Version
fields.description: Warning when a pack reference is missing the version field. Include the exact version array to ensure compatibility.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the pack_id missing the version

fields.title: Invalid Version
fields.description: Error when the version field in a pack reference is not a valid version array [major, minor, patch]. Version must match the referenced pack.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid version value

fields.title: Pack Not Found
fields.description: Error when a referenced pack UUID does not match any pack bundled with the world. Verify the pack exists and the UUID is correct.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the UUID of the missing pack

fields.title: Processing Error
fields.description: An internal error occurred while processing pack references. Check logs for details.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the internal error
